txt.en: 'Quickly! Okhíso went inside the tower! We must go after him - he must not escape!'
Speak with Mizâdi outside the tower in Kûr Anzar when you are ready to go
'We must put these fires out, and save as many as we can!'
Okhíso has fled inside the tower of Kûr Anzar. Mizâdi seeks your help in pursuing him and bringing his tyrannical reign to an end.
A Blade of Flame and Fury, Part 2
'We must go now, before he slips our grasp!'
Speak with Mizâdi outside the tower in Kûr Anzar when you are ready.
Speak with Mizâdi inside the tower in Kûr Anzar.
Speak with Mizâdi inside the tower in Kûr Anzar
